Text: Mount Mckinley NGL StorageThis is an estimate for both mm and mm gal Butane storage

Re CA Division of Oil Gas Filings Cc found the form in Garys office We are in the process of completing the form and will have in the mail today Do you want me to call Mike Edward Attanasio AM To Rick ott cc Bob JacobsLong ott Molly ott John ott Subject CA Division of Oil Gas Filings I certainly dont want to jump to any conclusions but I am concerned that this may be yet another item that just dropped from the radar screen once Gary left Because Gary did not prepare the transition memo that I asked for we may only find out about certain tasks we have not completed through notices like this from agenies It goes without saying that this is less than desirable Do you know anything about this specific filing for DOG It must pertain to our injection wells as they are the only wells I know about that we own Please let me know as soon as you can so I can call Glinzak and work something out re our past due filings As for EHS generally I guess all I can suggest is to try to have Scott you and me prepare a list of things we know will have to be dealt with on a recurring basis such as these reports source testing etc and be prepared to discuss them next week in Long Beach along with the issue of who exactly at ETS isare going to be responsible for performing these specific tasks and the EHS function generally Thanks Forwarded by Edward AttanasioRemoteEott on PM John Zimmerman PM To Edward ott cc Molly Sample Subject CA Division of Oil Gas Filings Ed I took a call from Mike Glinzak of the OG Division tele He was looking for EOTT Q and Q quarterly well production filings Form I believe these forms had previously been filed by Gary Fuller for the wells at North Coles Levee He said it was a courtesy call but also noted that interest and late filing penalties would soon be issued on the Q report which apparently is past due Can you figure out where we stand with this and get back to him or put him in touch with proper individual Let me know if I can be of assistance Thanks JZ

Re Testing REsults Cc to convince the air board yesterday that the testing done to the heater should be thrown out due to procedures not followed The other company did not do the sampling at the correct elevation in the stackas well as problems found with the calibrations of his equipment The air board agreed to disregard all testing done by the first company We completed the testing on the heater late yesterday using Aeros and passed without a problem We were going to also test the heater yesterday but the air board requested we wait until next week as we were getting a late start There were not going to be any additional fines for the delayed testing due to it was at the air boards request I will let you know how next week goes Thanks again for the help Larry NRON AM To Rick ott cc Edward ott Rich JollyET nron William nron Butch RussellET nron John nron Louis SoldanoET nron Subject Testing REsults Rick how did the AEROS emissions testing go with the heater
